name: Fireguard
description:
Keep the fire alive and try to survive the night as treants, slimes, and floating eyeballs try to end your life and invade your personal space.

NOTE: If no monsters are spawning, Just refresh the page.

[Controls]

WSAD to move.

Mouse to aim and throw.

To fire up the stick, get it in hand and put in the stick into fireplace.

[Story]

You're the last living human of the Great Forest. You must be avare of the dangers that lives in the forest. Your only light source is the fireplace. Protect it and don't let the flame die out!

[Credits]
